DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the incidence of low levels of oxygen as determined by standard pulse oximetry monitor in patients who have had total hip or knee replacement/revision.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Postoperative Pulse Oximetry in Patients Presenting for Total Hip and Total Knee Replacement
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing knee replacement or hip replacement/revision Patients requiring mechanical ventilation after surgery Patients with hemoglobinopathy that cause inaccurate pulse oximetry
